case.title: Submissive Girl for Daddy - m4w - 51 (NYC/Long Island)
case.text: I am a strong, successful, powerful daddy. I require submissive young ladies with an intense desire to please. I am physically and mentally imposing and in complete control. I am unlike any other man out here. You must be between 18 and 30 and real---no nonsense or time-wasting! Put "serve" in your response or it will be thrown away
